name: Upper-body Calisthenics Workshop
description:
Join us for a 90-minute empowering workshop designed exclusively for women to master the fundamentals of upper body calisthenics. Whether you're a beginner or looking to refine your skills, this session will focus on building strength, improving form, and gaining confidence in your bodyweight training. Together, we'll cover essential exercises like push-ups, dips, and pull-ups, breaking them down step-by-step to ensure you leave with a solid foundation. Come ready to challenge yourself, learn new techniques, and connect with like-minded women on the same journey toward a stronger, fitter you!  
Post the session, you can enjoy some refreshing coffee from Sleepy Owl on the house! 
Date: 12th January 2025, Sunday 
Reporting Time: 9.45 am 
Venue: CaliOG, Koramangla 
Call or WhatsApp Saachi (9513334690) for any queries 
*please carry a water bottle to keep you hydrated

location.name: CaliOG
location.address: 84,  1st C Main Rd,  Jakkasandra,  1st Block Koramangala,  Koramangala,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560034

name: Dance Party with Jagriti
description:
Looking to enjoy your Sunday while still getting a great workout in? Join us at this 1 hour Dance Party with Jagriti vibing to all the HITS in our cutest fits! 
Date: 19th January 2025, Sunday 
Time: 9-10 am (Please arrive at the studio by 8.45 am) 
Venue: Dhurii Academy of Arts, Domlur 
*Be sure to bring a water bottle to stay hydrated!

location.name: Dhurii Academy of Arts
location.address: Domlur, 13,  3rd Floor,  Patel Ram Reddy Rd,  Krishna Reddy Layout,  Amarjyoti Layout,  Domlur,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560071

name: Pole Workshop with Azdah
description:
Looking for a fun way to boost your fitness and confidence? Join us for a 90-minute pole workshop! This class is perfect for everyone, whether you're a complete beginner or looking to build on your skills. Azdah, our incredible instructor will be there to support you every step of the way, helping you learn new moves and have a great time. It’s all about discovering your strength, feminity and expressing yourself in a welcoming environment.  
Date: 19th January 2025, Sunday 
Time: 3 - 4.30 pm (Please arrive at the studio by 2.45 pm) 
Venue: Azdah, Indiranagar 
Attire: We’d recommend tight clothing that exposes as much skin as possible, because the skin to bar contact is very important. So you can carry a sports bra and cycling shorts or something of the sort! 
*Be sure to bring a water bottle to stay hydrated! 
Contact Saachi (9513334690) for more info

location.name: Azdah
location.address: Third Floor,  North Portion,  549/3,  9th A Main Rd,  Stage 1,  Indiranagar,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560038

name: Footy With Sisters, Beginner - Indiranagar
description:
FOOTY WITH THE SISTERS 
Bring out those football boots or shoes and remember to clean 'em nice! We're getting on the field to play the Beautiful game! 
These sessions are open to all women! The football drills will be designed to both have fun and at the same time, learn and build on your basics of the sport! 
Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm-up, football drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. It is a super fun start to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
What to wear? Comfortable workout clothes, incase you don't have access to football studs/turf shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :) 
Don't miss this!! See you on the field Sisters!! 
For any further queries contact 
Vaibhavi - 9886520914

location.name: The Bull Ring Arena:

name: Footy at The Yard
description:
FOOTY SESSION @ THE YARD 
Get ready for an exciting, high-energy football experience where fun meets competition! These sessions are open to all women! The football drills will be designed to both have fun and at the same time, learn and build on your basics of the sport! 
Each session is 90mins long, and will consist of a warm-up, football drills which are fun and athletic, a small game and a cool down at the end. It is a super fun start to your day and apart from that, even helps you get in your cardio for the day! 
The Yard is also giving all SIS members a special breakfast deal at Rs.400 + gst this includes 1 drink + 1 dish  (this is not included in the session fee) 
What to wear? comfortable workout clothes, incase you do't have access to football studs/turf shoes, training shoes would be sufficient. 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of enthusiasm to play :)  
See you on the field sisters! 
For any further further queries contact 
Vaibhavi - 9886520914

location.name: The Yard
location.address: 22/A,  Doddanakundi Industrial Area 2,  Phase 1,  Doddanekkundi,  Bengaluru,  Karnataka 560048

name: Baddy With Sisters, Beginner + Intermediate - Play Zone
url: https://sistersinsweat.in/session_details/badminton/Baddy With Sisters, Beginner + Intermediate - Play Zone
description:
Badminton for Beginners & Intermediates! 
Whether you’re picking up a racket for the first time or looking to improve your game, our Beginner & Intermediate Badminton sessions are designed to help you build confidence, refine your technique, and have a great time on the court. You’ll get the chance to learn through drills, practice sessions, and friendly matches, making every game both a learning experience and a whole lot of fun. sessions are 120mins long. 
What to wear? comfortable workout clothes and non-marking shoes 
What to bring? A bottle of water, a towel to wipe off sweat (if required) and loads of entusiasm to play :) See you on the court sisters! 
For any further queries contact 
Vaibhavi - 9886520914

name: Run With The Sisters
description:
Bangalore Sisters! 
 
There's nothing quite like starting your Sunday by running in Cubbon Park - the lungs of the city - with a group of amazing women! 
 
The Run session is led by an instructor and includes warm up, a 3K/5K run in the park (based on your comfort) and cool down.  
 
Meeting Time: 6:50am 
Meeting Point: In front of Coffee Day Square, across Cubbon Park 
 
After everyone has collected at the meeting point, we walk across to Cubbon Park by around 7am, where the instructor will begin the Warm Up. 
 
Level: This session is open to runners of all Levels, from absolute beginners to regular runners. 
 
What you should carry: 
• Bottle of water 
• Running shoes preferable 
 
In case of any queries, feel free to contact: 
Adit: +91 89514 18918 
Tanvie: +91 8800199418

name: Yoga with The Sisters
description:
Yoga With The Sisters 
Start your sunday morning with a relaxing yoga session at cubbon park, all you need to bring is a mat and bottle of water. Its for everyone from beginner to intermediate level! 
Yoga Instructor: Chanchal 
Meeting time: 8:15  
Meeting Point: CCD Square 
For any further queries conact 
Vaibhavi - 9886520914
